text:
addressing, as you have already told him a RO is in place and your interpretation of the impact of that.
I am not going to use this forum to debate our feelings and perspectives on it, as we have a different view point.
I am following up with my lawyer on how we might communicate on this issue in a way that is productive and I feel safe.
Please respect that I am in a different place in regards to what has transpired and am navigating as best I can.
I still believe Dr. Brown can assist but that has paused based on your feedback.
Message 888 of 4024
We are both in a different place. You are as convicted about up as I am convicted about down. I donâ€™t care to debate either. We are both equally
convicted.
What I am asking, is that we do not forget that. We address that. But, for now. For AD. We show that in parallel we are still his parents. He is still
number 1
Sent:01/31/2024 at 06:11 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/31/2024 at 06:26 PM)
Subject:Re: Is AD ok?
Message 889 of 4024
Wait. Why is Dr Brown paused? It was your idea. Lisa said yes. I thought we were full steam ahead. When did that get paused? Are we not doing
anything at all? Sorry, I am totally confused. And I guess I am not sure why we did the RO?
Do we have any plans to move forward? What was the point of it if nothing has changed? I'm not fighting. I am asking in earnest just as I have done
all day. I want to work with you and am trying, but did singing that make any difference?
Sent:01/31/2024 at 06:27 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/31/2024 at 06:27 PM)
Subject:Re: Is AD ok?
Message 890 of 4024
You pushed back on my suggestion on how to move forward with Dr. Brown to help provide additional guidance. You can review threads. If you are
aligned I will reach out tomorrow to start conversation and see if she is willing to assist.
I will talk to my lawyer on how to move forward with conversation and not violate RO.
